actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Mr. James M. Roche should be commended for his pioneering voluntary service as Chairman of the National Committee for Employer Support of the Guard and Reserve.

summary.text: Expresses the tribute of the Senate to James M. Roche for his voluntary service as Chairman of the National Committee for Employer Support of the Guard and Reserve.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Mr. James M. Roche should be commended for his pioneering voluntary service as Chairman of the National Committee for Employer Support of the Guard and Reserve.
